page.name: Alls Well That Ends Well
page.description: You have ventured into this network of caves to stop the VurrMen from poisoning several local wells with their magic plague.

properties.name: Alls Well That Ends Well
properties.description: You have ventured into this network of caves to stop the VurrMen from poisoning several local wells with their magic plague.
properties.complete: With only seconds to spare you stopped the VurrMan Plaguebringer from poisoning the drinking water in this well... but there are several other wells in the area connected to the tunnels that the VurrMen have built.
